author: Heiddis422
title: Best location in Manhattan
text:
We stayed at the Avalon Hotel in December 2016 and loved it! Price was very good for the quality and location and staff very helpful especially Nayja (not sure how it's spelled).
We got a discount coupon for breakfast and liked it a lot, the wifi was bad in our room but it was fixed and worked just fine after we told the staff. Everything was really clean and the room was warm.
Only disappointment was that my boyfriend had requested a bottle of wine and glasses to be in our room the night he proposed but the staff could not arrange it, later on they brought us a fruit basket witch was nice but not as nice as a bottle of wine.
Lovely hotel, great spot, friendly staff and good value for money!
